languages.text: {n}Караэль смотрит на вас с брезгливым видом, но, заметив прищур Маражая, все же открывает рот:{/n} "Впервые весть о том, что дракон выжил и находится в реальном мире, мне принесли старые шпионы с твоего корабля. Назракей рвал и метал, мечтая отыскать того, кто выставил его на посмешище перед Комморрой тем, что сначала сбежал с арены, затем — из Темного города, а затем — от повторного гнева мандрагор. Когда архонт нашел меня, он потребовал привести его к Маражаю".

{n}Kharael looks at you with revulsion, but he notices Marazhai's narrowed eyes and answers:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."
languages.original_text: {n}Караэль смотрит на вас с брезгливым видом, но, заметив прищур Маражая, все же открывает рот:{/n} "Впервые весть о том, что дракон выжил и находится в реальном мире, мне принесли старые шпионы с твоего корабля. Назракей рвал и метал, мечтая отыскать того, кто выставил его на посмешище перед Комморрой тем, что сначала сбежал с арены, затем — из Темного города, а затем — от повторного гнева мандрагор. Когда архонт нашел меня, он потребовал привести его к Маражаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael gives you a squeamish look, but notices Marazhai squint and opens his mouth:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in the realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who turned him into a laughingstock among the peers of Commorragh by first escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who turned him into a laughingstock among the peers of Commorragh by first escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

{n}Kharael looks at you with revulsion, but he notices Marazhai's narrowed eyes and answers:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

languages.text: {n}Kharael blickt dich angewidert an, doch er bemerkt Marazhais zusammengekniffene Augen und antwortet:{/n} "Ich habe von den alten Spionen an Bord Eures Schiffs erfahren, dass der Dracon überlebt hat und sich im Realraum aufhält. Nazrakhei war außer sich vor Freude. Er brannte darauf, den Mann zu finden, der ihn zum Gespött von Commorragh gemacht hatte, indem er zuerst aus der Arena entkommen war, dann aus der Dunklen Stadt geflohen war und schließlich noch den Zorn der Mandraks überlebt hatte. Als der Archon mich fand, verlangte er, dass ich ihn zu Marazhai bringe."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks at you with revulsion, but he notices Marazhai's narrowed eyes and answers:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael blickt dich angewidert an, doch er bemerkt Marazhais zusammengekniffene Augen und antwortet:{/n} "Ich habe von den alten Spionen an Bord Eures Schiffs erfahren, dass der Dracon überlebt hat und sich im Realraum aufhält. Nazrakhei war außer sich vor Freude. Er brannte darauf, den Mann zu finden, der ihn zum Gespött von Commorragh gemacht hatte, indem er zuerst aus der Arena entkommen war, dann aus der Dunklen Stadt geflohen war und schließlich noch den Zorn der Mandraks überlebt hatte. Als der Archon mich fand, verlangte er, dass ich ihn zu Marazhai bringe."

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔厌恶地看着你，但他注意到玛拉斋眯起了眼睛，于是老老实实地开了口。{/n}“我们是通过你船上留下的间谍，得知裁决官幸存下来，进入真实世界的消息。裁决官先是逃出了竞技场，之后逃离了黑暗之城，还逃过了曼德拉的追杀，这把纳札骸气疯了。他打算不惜代价，找到那个让他在整个科摩罗沦为笑柄的人。于是纳札骸找到了我，要求我带他去找玛拉斋。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks at you with revulsion, but he notices Marazhai's narrowed eyes and answers:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔厌恶地看着你，但他注意到玛拉斋眯起了眼睛，于是老老实实地开了口。{/n}“我们是通过你船上留下的间谍，得知裁决官幸存下来，进入真实世界的消息。裁决官先是逃出了竞技场，之后逃离了黑暗之城，还逃过了曼德拉的追杀，这把纳札骸气疯了。他打算不惜代价，找到那个让他在整个科摩罗沦为笑柄的人。于是纳札骸找到了我，要求我带他去找玛拉斋。”

languages.text: {n}Kharael vous fixe avec dégoût, puis remarque le regard accusateur de Marazhai et répond :{/n} « Ce sont les anciens espions à bord de votre vaisseau qui m'ont appris que le Dracon avait survécu et qu'il se trouvait dans l'espace réel. Nazrakhei ne voulait qu'une chose, retrouver celui qui l'avait ridiculisé à Commorragh, et pour cela, il entendait s'échapper de l'arène, fuir la Cité Crépusculaire et enfin survivre à la colère des Mandragores. Quand l'archonte m'a trouvé, il a exigé que je l'emmène voir Marazhai. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks at you with revulsion, but he notices Marazhai's narrowed eyes and answers:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael vous fixe avec dégoût, puis remarque le regard accusateur de Marazhai et répond :{/n} « Ce sont les anciens espions à bord de votre vaisseau qui m'ont appris que le Dracon avait survécu et qu'il se trouvait dans l'espace réel. Nazrakhei ne voulait qu'une chose, retrouver celui qui l'avait ridiculisé à Commorragh, et pour cela, il entendait s'échapper de l'arène, fuir la Cité Crépusculaire et enfin survivre à la colère des Mandragores. Quand l'archonte m'a trouvé, il a exigé que je l'emmène voir Marazhai. »

languages.text: {n}Kharael te mira, asqueado, pero al ver la mirada entrecerrada de Marazhai responde:{/n} «La noticia de la supervivencia del Dracón y de su presencia en el espacio real me llegó de manos de los antiguos espías de tu nave. Nazrakhei estaba fuera de sí, esperando encontrar a quien lo había convertido en el hazmerreír de Commorragh, primero escapando de la arena, luego de la Ciudad Siniestra y por último sobreviviendo a la furia de las mandrágoras. Cuando el Arconte me encontró, me exigió que le llevara hasta Marazhai».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks at you with revulsion, but he notices Marazhai's narrowed eyes and answers:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael te mira, asqueado, pero al ver la mirada entrecerrada de Marazhai responde:{/n} «La noticia de la supervivencia del Dracón y de su presencia en el espacio real me llegó de manos de los antiguos espías de tu nave. Nazrakhei estaba fuera de sí, esperando encontrar a quien lo había convertido en el hazmerreír de Commorragh, primero escapando de la arena, luego de la Ciudad Siniestra y por último sobreviviendo a la furia de las mandrágoras. Cuando el Arconte me encontró, me exigió que le llevara hasta Marazhai».

languages.text: {n}カラエルはあなたに嫌悪の視線を向けていたが、マラズハイが目を細めたのに気づいて答える：{/n}「ドラコンが生き延びてリアルスペースにいるという知らせは、あなたの船に乗っている古いスパイから最初に私に届けられた。ナズラクヘイがそばにいて、彼をコモラフの笑いものに変えてくれる者が見つかればいいと思っていた、まずはアリーナから逃げ出し、次に仄暗き都から逃げ出し、そして最後はマンドレイクの怒りに耐え抜くことで。アーコンが私を見つけてくれたとき、私にマラズハイを連れてくるように要求したのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks at you with revulsion, but he notices Marazhai's narrowed eyes and answers:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルはあなたに嫌悪の視線を向けていたが、マラズハイが目を細めたのに気づいて答える：{/n}「ドラコンが生き延びてリアルスペースにいるという知らせは、あなたの船に乗っている古いスパイから最初に私に届けられた。ナズラクヘイがそばにいて、彼をコモラフの笑いものに変えてくれる者が見つかればいいと思っていた、まずはアリーナから逃げ出し、次に仄暗き都から逃げ出し、そして最後はマンドレイクの怒りに耐え抜くことで。アーコンが私を見つけてくれたとき、私にマラズハイを連れてくるように要求したのだ」

languages.text: {n}Kharael sana tiksintiyle bakıyor ancak Marazhai'ın kısılmış gözlerini görünce yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Drakon'un hayatta kaldığına ve gerçekuzayda olduğuna dair haberler ilk başta bana gemindeki eski casuslarım tarafından iletildi. Nazrakhei, önce arenadan kaçarak, sonra Kara Şehir'i terk ederek ve sonunda da Kankurutanların gazabından canlı kurtularak onu Commorragh'ta alay konusu hâline getiren kişiyi bulma umuduyla çılgına dönmüştü. Arkon beni bulduğunda, Marazhai'ı ona getirmemi istedi."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael looks at you with revulsion, but he notices Marazhai's narrowed eyes and answers:{/n} "The news that the Dracon survived and is in realspace was first brought to me by the old spies aboard your vessel. Nazrakhei was beside himself hoping to find the one who had turned him into the laughingstock of Commorragh first by escaping from the arena, then by fleeing the Dark City, and finally by surviving the Mandrakes' wrath. When the Archon found me, he demanded I bring him to Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael sana tiksintiyle bakıyor ancak Marazhai'ın kısılmış gözlerini görünce yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Drakon'un hayatta kaldığına ve gerçekuzayda olduğuna dair haberler ilk başta bana gemindeki eski casuslarım tarafından iletildi. Nazrakhei, önce arenadan kaçarak, sonra Kara Şehir'i terk ederek ve sonunda da Kankurutanların gazabından canlı kurtularak onu Commorragh'ta alay konusu hâline getiren kişiyi bulma umuduyla çılgına dönmüştü. Arkon beni bulduğunda, Marazhai'ı ona getirmemi istedi."
